title: Design & Automate Icon Library with Figma
description: Learn how to create and automate your icon library using Figma in this informative talk.

title: Thinking in Code for Designer
description: Explore the world of coding from a designer's perspective and discover how it can enhance your creative process.

title: Introduction to User Experience Design
description: Get started with the fundamentals of User Experience (UX) Design in this introductory guide.

title: Careers 101: Prepare to applying jobs or intern
description: Explore essential preparation steps for successful job and internship applications in this insightful talk presented within the Jagongan Stematel high school community.

title: Easily Structure & Communicate Ideas using Wireframe
description: Dive into the world of wireframes and discover how they can be a powerful tool for idea development and execution.

title: Designing with Data: Using A/B Testing to Help Improve User Experience
description: Unlock the potential of A/B testing in product development, gain insights into its definition, and understand its pivotal role in creating impactful user experiences.

title: Designing Experience and Interface
description: This talk is about introduction of designing experience in building product.

title: Craft Solution using Design Thinking
description: Lead a workshop on design thinking, guiding participants from problem identification to the creation of innovative solutions.

title: Building Instagram-like Prototype using Framer
description: Facilitate a hands-on workshop where participants learn to create interactive prototypes resembling Instagram using the Framer design tool.

title: Be Awesome with Git
description: Lead a workshop on harnessing the power of Git for efficient version control and collaboration in software development projects.
